message: I think it's fair to take most of the money, but I'm willing to split it a little.  Let's see if you want to play this game further!
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided. Let's be reasonable. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?
Let's be a little more fair. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think 55/45 is a good compromise. What do you think?
Alice, this back and forth isn't getting us anywhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it or leave it.
